nodes.text: Ergesh language was the language spoken by the Ergesh.

The Ergesh language was said to sound like thick mud coming out of a rapid boil. Ergesh were very wet, and fluid meant everything to them, so there was no word in the Ergesh language to mean "dry"; there was a word though, meaning "not wet", which was usually used as a curse. Most members of the Ergesh species preferred to speak Basic, though it sounded as if the speaker was talking underwater.
